## Requirement Reference
- **Requirement ID:** FR#LUR-2
- **Source Document:** Requirement/Functional/V1/2#LookupReterival/FR#LUR-2 - Get Candidate Designation Details.md

## Description
System should allow retrieval of candidate designation details.

## Request/Response
- **Request:** CandidateDesignationID (guid)
- **Response:** CandidateDesignationID, Name, DisplayName

## User Roles
- Master Admin
- Practice Admin
- Tech Team Panel Member
- TA Team Admin
